title: Why did Akanksha Singh get AIR 2 and Soyeb Aftab got AIR 1 in the NEET 2020 even when they both secured the same marks of 720? - Quora

response.answer_text: OMG,what the level of competition is going on…This year perception thinking and prediction all kept aside..on talent going for a kill…ability to outperform and outnumber is clearly seen. It's very very good sign because those are best will have no effect, those who arerelax think it will be if we do in last few months preparation or crash course will be crushed brutally. This year result is type of massacre for non performers, It has given a clear picture that if you don't study seriously there is no place for you in any good institute or less in others. My congratulations to all who created Tsunami with their results. Now about the position, it is given in the rules for criteria of being in merit and ranking. In case of equal marks:-  See the percentile score difference, it is almost same and hence the ranking is made of basis of this given below. Biology marks are considered first.ChemistryTotal number of lesswring answersAge who ever is higher will be preferred., That's why Akanksha scored second

Akanksha secured the second spot with a perfect 720 score. She missed rank 1 as topper Soyeb Aftab is a year older than her. So age matters in NEET and those who are thinking that NEET will get toughter every year, let me tell you that this year most of the question are from NCERT and because of this the cut-off was high.
